description:
While searching for clues on how to undo the curse on the island, they come across a suspicious temple ruin. There they discover the immortal demon, Deliora, that Gray`s old teacher Ul had sealed in the Northern Continent. A man who calls himself Reitei is using the magical power from the moon to break that seal, but when Gray hears his voice... What does Galuna`s curse have to do with Deliora, and what relation does Reitei have to Gray?! What is the true meaning behind the curse?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 月の雫[ムーンドリップ]
